title: S2 Ep27: Italy is a very sick patient
itunes:title: Italy is a very sick patient
description: Are Italy's populist policies of miniBOTs and flat taxes the right medicine for its economic sickness? Fabio Ghironi tells Tim Phillips that, if Italy doesn't attempt fundamental structural reforms, it may be on the path to Eurexit.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
